SQL.LOAD: SELECT description, code, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, culture_code, active_flag, territory, language_id FROM elp_language WHERE language_id = :language_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select language_id, code, description, culture_code, territory from elp_language --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY UPPER(description)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_language SET description = :description, code = :code, culture_code = :culture_code, active_flag = :active_flag, territory = :territory, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE language_id = :language_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_language ( description, code, culture_code, active_flag, territory, created_by, language_id ) VALUES ( :description, :code, :culture_code, :active_flag, :territory, :created_by, :language_id )
